verses.name: Philemon 1:20
verses.text: Yea, brother, let me have joy of thee in the Lord: refresh my bowels in the Lord.

verses.name: Philemon 1:21
verses.text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee, knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say.

verses.name: Philemon 1:22
verses.text: But withal prepare me also a lodging: for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you.

verses.name: Philemon 1:23
verses.text: There salute thee Epaphras, my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus;

verses.name: Philemon 1:24
verses.text: Marcus, Aristarchus, Demas, Lucas, my fellowlabourers.

verses.name: Philemon 1:25
verses.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.  Written from Rome to Philemon, by Onesimus a servant.
